attributes.action: Recognise the Wiltshire Town Of Wootton Basset  for Honouring Our Fallen British Service Personnel
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We would like the Wiltshire Town of Wootton Basset recognised and awarded the Highest possible award for the way the townsfolk and the Royal British Legion honour our Fallen Service Personnel when they are carried through the town.On thier final Journey Home to thier loved ones

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
